Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Prohibits libraries and library systems from banning books or other materials based on partisan or doctrinal disapproval
Summary: Prohibits libraries and library systems, including school libraries and school library systems from banning books or other materials based on partisan or doctrinal disapproval.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting libraries and library systems from banning books or other materials based on partisan or doctrinal disapproval
